item.title: 20 Mar 2018 11:53
item.description:
As we enter Lugazi on route A109 towards Jinja, Google Maps suggests we take an unpaved dirt road on the left. The red slushy path meanders through small shops and houses and an eerie sense of awareness creeps in as villagers notice the Toyota … | https://t.co/VEh9enLv1F

Link to Tweet
